article_title: Large HSAs Trump 'Obamacare-Lite' Tax Credits At Delivering Better Healthcare

article_metadata.description: Tax credits are ObamaCare-lite, would cement many of ObamaCare's worst features in place, and would replicate its awful results. Unless conservatives give tax credits the scrutiny they should have applied to the Heritage plan in the 1990s, they will make the same mistake all over again. Large HSAs would deliver better, more affordable, more secure health care, and give workers a larger effective tax cut than all Reagan and Bush tax cuts combined.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
